Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (05/05/2022)
------------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (20/07/2022)
------------------
- Added the unsubscribe option.

0.0.3 (20/07/2022)
------------------
- Implemented try catch statement

0.0.8 (21/10/2022)
------------------
- fixed an issue such that it is possible now to subscribe to many topics on the same subscriber.
